name: maranga-berry
effect: Held: When the holder is hit by a special move, increases its Special Defense by one stage.
short_effect: Held: When the holder is hit by a special move, increases its Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder’s Sp. Def if it’s hit with a special move.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder’s Sp. Def if it’s hit with a special move.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will increase the holder’s Sp. Def if it’s hit with a special move.
